nodes.text: The Atollon Coral Mesa was a land formation situated on the planet of Atollon. A broad, flat-topped elevation, it was covered in huge coralline formations. Many creatures, including krykna and dokma, lived in the area. The Bendu, a powerful being who represented a balance in the Force, also lived in a valley in the center of the Coral Mesa.
In 3 BBY[source?] Phoenix Cell established a base on the Coral Mesa.
